argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinveu.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpinveu.2 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_grpoidcl | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> U e. X ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_grporcan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ U e. X /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G A ) = ( U G A ) <-> A = U ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3exp2 | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( A e. X -> ( U e. X -> ( A e. X -> ( ( A G A ) = ( U G A ) <-> A = U ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_mpid | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( A e. X -> ( A e. X -> ( ( A G A ) = ( U G A ) <-> A = U ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_pm2.43d | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( A e. X -> ( ( A G A ) = ( U G A ) <-> A = U ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_imp | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A G A ) = ( U G A ) <-> A = U ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_grpolid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( U G A ) = A ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A G A ) = ( U G A ) <-> ( A G A ) = A ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_bitr3d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A = U <-> ( A G A ) = A ) ) |
